entry.title: Shepard Test Stand - Bug #175: Java GUI does not yet save CSV of data captured from the Arduino
entry.content:
• Status changed from In Progress to Feedback
  • Target version changed from v1.1 Shepard Test Stand - Prototype to v2.0 Shepard Test Stand - Prototype

To accommodate this feature, I've added a preferences panel for configurable items such as the location to save the CSV files.
